price: 177. Tango ndeko wa bango Shuaîb ayebisaki bango: Boye bozali kobanga (Allah) te?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum shuʿaybun alā tattaqūna
